levels.description:
Range <@ba.vup>expands</>, immediately deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> Arts damage to all enemies within range and reduces their RES by <@ba.vup>-{-magic_resistance:0%}</> for <@ba.vup>{duration}</> seconds
<@ba.rem>Can store up to {ct} charges</>
